name: Boxfight (itch)
description: 20 boxes. One of them is you. And you just got given a lotta guns. Boxfight is a third person online multiplayer which suits all your box slaughtering needs. Go into the fight alone, against the world. Or, jump in a match with your friends, and have some good times together! However you wanna play it, Boxfight is the one for you.
